rewards.name: Cashback
rewards.earningText: 1.5% unlimited cashback on all eligible retail spends
rewards.joiningBonus: ₹1,000 cashback on ₹20,000 spend within 30 days + ₹250 Amazon voucher on video KYC
rewards.exclusions: Utilities, Fuel, Wallet loads, Rent, Education, Government, Insurance, Jewellery, EMI, Tolls, Financial Institutions, Money Transfers

calculator.specialLogic: 10% cashback on dining, grocery, and food delivery combined capped at ₹1,000/month. 1.5% unlimited on other retail spends. Cashback auto-credited to statement.

metadata.bestFor: 10% cashback on dining, grocery, and food delivery spends
metadata.verdict: Best-in-class cashback card for dining & grocery spenders with a low annual fee and strong 10% return on everyday essentials.
pros: 10% cashback on dining, grocery, and food delivery
1.5% unlimited cashback on other retail spends
Low annual fee of ₹999 with easy waiver
Live+ Dining Program with additional discounts
cons: Long exclusion list including utilities and insurance

fees.waiverText: Annual fee waived for HSBC Premier relationship holders

rewards.name: HSBC Reward Points
rewards.earningText: 3 Reward Points per ₹100 spent (3% return at 1:1 redemption)
rewards.joiningBonus: 20,000 Reward Points on card activation + Taj Epicure Membership + Taj Gift Card worth ₹12,000 + EazyDiner Prime Membership
rewards.exclusions: Fuel (from Apr 2025), Education, E-wallets, Jewellery, Bail & Bond payments. Utilities/Insurance capped at ₹1L/month combined for select MCCs

calculator.specialLogic: 3 RP per ₹100 on all spends. From Apr 2025, select categories (utilities, insurance, education, govt, jewellery) capped at ₹1L monthly spend combined. Fuel completely excluded. 1:1 transfer to 20+ airline/hotel partners.

redemption.bestOption: 1:1 transfer to airline miles or Apple products

golf.text: Complimentary golf sessions via Premier benefits

forex.text: 0.99% - One of the lowest in India

metadata.bestFor: HSBC Premier customers seeking unlimited lounge access and 1:1 airline mile transfers
metadata.verdict: Exceptional travel card for HSBC Premier customers with 0.99% forex, unlimited lounges, and flexible 1:1 mile transfers to 20+ partners.
pros: 0.99% forex markup - among the lowest in India
cons: Requires HSBC Premier relationship (₹40L TRB or ₹3L salary)
₹20,000 annual fee if Premier criteria not met
From Apr 2025: fuel excluded, caps on utilities/insurance

fees.waiverText: Waived on ₹8,00,000 net retail spend in previous anniversary year

rewards.name: AU Reward Points
rewards.earningText: 1 RP per ₹100 on retail spends (1 RP = ₹1)
rewards.joiningBonus: Choice of luxury brand vouchers or Reward Points worth ₹5,000 on card activation
rewards.exclusions: Fuel, EMI, Cash transactions. Special categories (Utility, Insurance, Rent, Education, Govt) excluded from milestone calculation

calculator.specialLogic: 2 RP/₹100 on travel, dining, and international spends (2% value). 1 RP/₹100 on other retail (1% value). 1 RP = ₹1 redemption. Monthly milestone: 1,000 RP on ₹75,000 spend. Taj Epicure on ₹12L annual spend.

redemption.bestOption: Gift vouchers or AU Rewardz redemption

lounge.international: 8 per year (2 per quarter via Priority Pass)

golf.text: 8 complimentary golf games/lessons per year (2 per quarter)

movies.text: 16 BOGO tickets/year via BookMyShow (4 per quarter, up to ₹500/ticket)

metadata.bestFor: Travelers and high spenders seeking 0.99% forex, comprehensive lounge access, and lifestyle benefits
metadata.verdict: Well-rounded super-premium metal card with 0.99% forex, extensive lounge access, and strong lifestyle benefits including golf and movies.
pros: 0.99% forex markup - excellent for international spends
16 BOGO movie tickets + 8 golf rounds annually
cons: Lower reward rate (1-2%) compared to some competitors

fees.waiverText: Currently Lifetime Free. Otherwise waived on ₹1,00,000 annual spend

rewards.name: ixigo Reward Points
rewards.earningText: 10 RP per ₹200 online (2.5%), 5 RP per ₹200 offline (1.25%)
rewards.joiningBonus: 1,000 Reward Points + ₹1,000 ixigo money voucher on first transaction within 30 days
rewards.exclusions: Fuel, Rent, Insurance, Jewellery, Wallets, Education, Government, BBPS, International transactions (from Dec 2024)

calculator.specialLogic: ZERO FOREX MARKUP - Key USP. 10 RP/₹200 online (2.5%), 5 RP/₹200 offline (1.25%), 20 RP/₹200 on train bookings via ixigo (5%). 1 RP = ₹0.50 as ixigo money, ₹0.20 for AU vouchers. 10% discount on flights/hotels/buses via ixigo.

redemption.bestOption: Convert to ixigo money for travel bookings

lounge.domestic: 8 airport + 8 railway per year (2 each per quarter on ₹20K spend)

metadata.bestFor: Budget-conscious travelers seeking zero forex markup and ixigo platform discounts
metadata.verdict: India's best zero forex card for budget travelers with ixigo discounts, railway lounge access, and lifetime free status.
pros: ZERO forex markup - saves 3.5%+ on international spends
10% discount on ixigo flights, hotels, buses
Earns rewards on forex spends (unlike most zero forex cards)
Available in RuPay variant for UPI
cons: Long exclusion list including international from Dec 2024
Benefits maximized only on ixigo platform

name: OneCard Metal Credit Card
bank: Federal Bank / BOB / SBM / Indian Bank / CSB / South Indian Bank

fees.waiverText: Lifetime Free - No joining or annual fee

rewards.name: OneCard Reward Points
rewards.earningText: 1 RP per ₹50 spent (base 0.2%), 5X on top 2 categories (1%)
rewards.joiningBonus: Instant virtual card activation + Regular merchant offers in app
rewards.exclusions: Transfers, Wallet loads, Cash withdrawals, Rent payments

calculator.specialLogic: Unique 5X rewards on top 2 spend categories automatically selected each month. Must spend in at least 3 categories to qualify for 5X. Fractional points earned. 1 RP = ₹0.10 for cashback.

metadata.bestFor: First-time credit card users wanting a free metal card with low forex markup
metadata.verdict: India's only lifetime free metal card - perfect for beginners with low forex needs, but limited rewards and no lounge access.
pros: Metal card form factor - unique at this price
No redemption fees, points never expire
cons: Must spend in 3+ categories for 5X rewards
Available as secured card for low credit scores
RBI restrictions on some partner banks

name: Tata Neu Infinity HDFC Bank Credit Card

fees.waiverText: Waived on ₹3,00,000 annual spend. LTF offer available till Dec 2024

rewards.name: NeuCoins
rewards.earningText: 1.5% NeuCoins on non-Tata spends, 5% on Tata Neu + extra 5% with NeuPass
rewards.joiningBonus: 1,499 NeuCoins on first transaction within 30 days (covers joining fee)
rewards.exclusions: Fuel, Wallet loads, Rent, Government, EMI, Cash advances. Grocery capped at 2,000/month. Utility/Telecom capped at 2,000/month each. UPI capped at 500/month.

calculator.specialLogic: Up to 10% on Tata Neu (5% base + 5% NeuPass). 1.5% on non-Tata. 1.5% on UPI via Tata Neu UPI ID (0.5% + 1% additional). 1 NeuCoin = ₹1. Multiple category caps apply.

travel.label: 1.5% NeuCoins (up to 10% on Air India via Tata Neu)

online.label: Up to 10% on Tata Neu brands

redemption.bestOption: Redeem on Tata Neu app across partner brands

options.desc: 1 NeuCoin = ₹1 at BigBasket, Croma, Westside, etc.

forex.text: 3.5% (2% for premium variant on some transactions)

metadata.bestFor: Tata ecosystem loyalists shopping on BigBasket, Croma, Air India, and Tata Neu brands
metadata.verdict: Best-in-class for Tata ecosystem users with up to 10% returns on Tata brands, UPI rewards on RuPay variant, and solid lounge access.
pros: Up to 10% back on Tata Neu purchases
cons: Not ideal for non-Tata brand shopping
